name: Grounded Avgeeks Try to Fly - Talking Rubbish Episode 5
description:
We're back!  Three avgeeks talking rubbish as we leap headfirst into 2021!

YouTube Aviation Royalty Jeb Brooks and Paul Stewart join me on this 5th installment of Talking Rubbish. 

In this episode we discover Jeb's learning to fly, we geek out as Paul uncovers aviation history and we talk about what 2021 has planned for us all.   

The next episode will be up on Paul's channel. 

Important links below:

Jeb Brooks:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsQLTECz1bCA56JIryaw-lA
Paul Steward:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChEU4Y6IZ-xcuCQ8l0XDH4A
